file.name: accessInfo-scopeId-accessInfoId-roles.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2

info:
  title: Eclipse Kapua REST API - Access Info
  version: '1.0'
  contact:
    name: Eclipse Kapua Dev Team
    url: https://eclipse.org/kapua
    email: kapua-dev@eclipse.org
  license:
    name: Eclipse Public License 2.0
    url: https://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0

paths:
  /{scopeId}/accessinfos/{accessInfoId}/roles:
    get:
      tags:
        - Access Role
      summary: Get all the AccessRoles
      operationId: accessRolesList
      parameters:
        - $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/parameters/scopeId'
        - $ref: './accessInfo.yaml#/components/parameters/accessInfoId'
        - $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/parameters/limit'
        - $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/parameters/offset'
      responses:
        200:
          description: The list of the AccessRole objects available in the Scope
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './accessInfo.yaml#/components/schemas/accessRoleListResult'
        401:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/unauthenticated'
        403:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/subjectUnauthorized'
        500:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/kapuaError'
    post:
      tags:
        - Access Role
      summary: Create an AccessRole
      operationId: accessRoleCreate
      parameters:
        - $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/parameters/scopeId'
        - $ref: './accessInfo.yaml#/components/parameters/accessInfoId'
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: './accessInfo.yaml#/components/schemas/accessRoleCreator'
      responses:
        201:
          description: The AccessRole that has just been created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './accessInfo.yaml#/components/schemas/accessRoleListResult'
        401:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/unauthenticated'
        403:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/subjectUnauthorized'
        500:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/kapuaError'

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /{scopeId}/accessinfos/{accessInfoId}/roles: get: operation "accessRolesList": parameters: parse parameter "": resolve "../openapi.yaml#/components/parameters/scopeId" reference: invalid parameter reference: "../openapi.yaml#/components/parameters/scopeId"
